TopicTitle: CKAN (The Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network); v1.28.0 - Dyson

Articles.Content: Snacks! has been updated for 1.5.X, but its still showing only the 1.5.0 version on CKAN.

22 minutes ago, Grenartia said:

Snacks! has been updated for 1.5.X, but its still showing only the 1.5.0 version on CKAN. 
 

Looks like it's up to date.

https://github.com/Angel-125/Snacks/releases

Can you be more specific about what's missing?

I don't know how to be more specific or clear about it.

Here's a screenshot:
@HebaruSan If there's any information you need that isn't in that screenshot, let me know.

2 hours ago, Grenartia said:

@HebaruSan If there's any information you need that isn't in that screenshot, let me know.

Thanks, I think I understand now. I think there's a subtle bug in how CKAN interprets certain specific .version files, which we can hopefully fix.
Thank you.

CKAN v1.25.3, KSP v1.4.5

I'm trying to install Intersteller Fuel Switch v3.6.15.1 from v3.6.14.1 and get the following error in CKAN.

Quote

CKAN.InvalidModuleFileKraken: InterstellarFuelSwitch 3.6.15.1: C:\Users\xxxx\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp8FA9.tmp has length 8911023, should be 8903643
   at CKAN.NetModuleCache.Store(CkanModule module, String path, String description, Boolean move)
   at CKAN.NetAsyncModulesDownloader.ModuleDownloadsComplete(NetModuleCache cache, Uri[] urls, String[] filenames, Exception[] errors)

The mod appears to download completely but the resulting Microsoft .NET framework exception corrupts CKAN - the menus and tabs become unresponsive although I can still select mods in the mod window.  Sometimes it results in the Unhandled Exception dialog, sometimes not.  I always have to restart CKAN.

Any guidance?

1 hour ago, Brigadier said:

Any guidance?

Click Refresh and try again. The metadata needed to be updated to match the replaced version of that download.

1 minute ago, HebaruSan said:

Click Refresh and try again. The metadata needed to be updated to match the replaced version of that download.

Flawless.  Install completed without errors.  Many thanks.
Hello. Have I done something to mess up CKAN upload from Spacedock option with the Duna Direct mod? Please advise. Thank you!

1 minute ago, bcink said:

Hello. Have I done something to mess up CKAN upload from Spacedock option with the Duna Direct mod? Please advise. Thank you!

No, you didn't; that button's currently broken on the SpaceDock side of things. The way it works now is that someone has to go through the list of recently added mods on SpaceDock and look for ones that have the "CKAN" tag, then index them manually.

33 minutes ago, HebaruSan said:

 The way it works now is that someone has to go through the list of recently added mods on SpaceDock and look for ones that have the "CKAN" tag, then index them manually.

Got it. Thank you!

Ah, I see now. It's the versioning. CKAN is displaying v1.8.06 (for KSP v1.3.1) as the latest version, but it shows the current v1.8.3.2 in the versions tab four lines down. This entry has the proper dependencies, but will be hidden for the modestly casual user.
